com.appriskgame.services

Class FortificationPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appriskgame.services.FortificationPhase

  • public class FortificationPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for the fortification phase of the game. It checks the number of countries user has proceeds if it is not less than 2. Takes the fromCountry and toCountry value which identifies from where the player wishes to move army and where. After performing requisite validation moves army of the player.
    Author:
    Dolly

    • Method Detail

      • startGameFortification

        public void startGameFortification(GamePlayer player,
                                   GameMap gameMap)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called from the Startup phase when the user opts to start the fortification. It internally calls the moveArmies method once all the validation with respect to fortification are performed.
        Parameters:
        player - - The player who is doing fortification.
        gameMap - - GameMap object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - throws Input-Output exception

      • moveArmies

        public void moveArmies(Country fromCountry,
                       Country toCountry,
                       int armiesCount)
        This method takes the values for each player from the startFortification method and does the manipulation of armies and assign the armies
        Parameters:
        fromCountry - - The country from where player want to move army
        toCountry - - The country to where player want to move army
        armiesCount - - Count of armies player wish to move
